1207000.name: Slime Rancher: Original Soundtrack II + The Casey Sessions
1207000.description:
Slime Rancher原声碟II+凯西选段中收录了自游戏上线以来，每次更新的全新曲目！22首独立曲目总时长超过70分钟，由混音师Harry Mack重新录制。每首曲目都是按照高音质mp3格式录制。在这张专辑中还有“凯西选段”。在读完碧翠斯从致远牧星发来的关于她各种冒险经历的星邮后，就有了这些凯西的个人曲目。

Slime Rancher原声碟II + 凯西选段专辑中收录了由混音师Harry Mack制作的22首曲目（包括8首全新曲目）。每首曲目都是按照高音质mp3格式录制。


Once purchased, files will be located in Steam\steamapps\common\SlimeRancher\Slime Rancher Original Soundtrack II


Track List:

Ogden's Retreat - Theme
The Wilds - Theme
Mochi's Manor - Theme
Nimble Valley - Theme
Nimble Valley - Race
Viktor's Workshop - Theme
The Slimeulation - Dry Reef
The Slimeulation - Indigo Quarry
The Slimeulation - Moss Blanket
The Slimeulation - Corruption (Bonus Track)
Party Gordo - Theme
Ogden's Retreat - Night
The Wilds - Night
Mochi's Manor - Night
Viktor's Workshop - Night
Wiggly Wonderland - Theme

The Casey Sessions
Home Out There (Casey Sessions)
The Farthest Forest (Casey Sessions)
No Stone Unturned (Casey Sessions)
The Past and You (Casey Sessions)
That Old Song (Casey Sessions)
For Bea, Always (Casey Sessions)
1207000.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 瑞典语, 简体中文, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 韩语
